name: Apotropaic
description:
Survive the nights as the little girl Eloise, in a dangerous historic university riddled with monsters! 

With the help of Eloise's imaginary friend Murmur, she can setup deadly traps to protect herself form the monsters invading the university at night.

Explore the university safely in the light of day, and unravel the mysteries of the university through talking to various characters you meet in the game.
